name: A Theif's Tale
description: A Thief's Tale is a 3D, puzzle, adventure game with stealth gameplay, platforming, and unique puzzles built for the PC. It is brimming with light-hearted humor and quirky characters. You take control of Crow, a recently orphaned child, who has been granted powers by his sketchy Fairy Godfather to jump inside the world of books. In these worlds you must "acquire" the treasure of the story in order to return to the real world. What treasures will you steal?
